name: Bone Runner – Dead Man Run Blitz Against Undead Cat with Fire and Coins by Uber Zany
name_original: Bone Runner – Dead Man Run Blitz Against Undead Cat with Fire and Coins by Uber Zany
description:
He can run, but he can't hide! Can you run? We dare you…

Can the Bone Runner go the distance? Can you? Avoid strange black cats, deadly fire pits, and chests that contain unknown creatures. Collect Skeleton Coins, earn new Runner.

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Killer good fun!

Download ‘Bone Runner’ Now!!!
